items.q: What is the hardest natural substance on Earth?
items.explanation: Diamond is an allotrope of carbon with a very rigid lattice structure.

items.q: Sound can travel through a vacuum like space.
items.explanation: Sound requires a medium (like air or water) to travel.
Jupiter's rings are faint but they do exist.

items.q: What gas do plants primarily absorb from the air?
items.explanation: Plants take in CO2 to perform photosynthesis.

items.q: What biological process converts food into energy in cells?
items.explanation: Mitochondria carry out this process to produce ATP.

items.q: Which element makes up the majority of the mass of the human body?
items.explanation: Since we are mostly water (H2O), and oxygen is much heavier than hydrogen, it dominates our mass.

items.q: What is the study of the weather called?
Name the longest bone in the human body.
items.explanation: The femur is located in the thigh.

items.q: What part of the cell contains genetic material?
items.explanation: The nucleus houses the DNA in eukaryotic cells.
